title: can someone explain to me how lp works in rank
body:
Why im i gaining so little lp when i win even when im doing good. It just makes it so hard to climb.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: My last 2 games of flex after placements gave me 13 and 14 lp and in the last 3 game of my placements in flex i was earning around 26 lp  which is nearly of what i was earning when i started placements. Ill reply again after i play a couple more games.
Same thing is happening to be im at most gettign 15 lp per match but usually 11 12 13 and loosing 18 to 20

is it for every game or just that one?

That particular game was a mega mismatch, your team was a Bronze/ 2 Silvers/Gold/Plat and theirs were all low bronze/irons so you beating them was expected and thus the reward for doing so was not much.

If you say you are getting such little LP after every game, then i would think there may be a bug
